BIO

Software engineer with focus on web development, currently residing in Minneapolis, MN I decided to get into coding because I have always been intrigued by solving puzzles either in real life or video games I always loved to have my mind busy trying to solve something, and coding was just that. So as either as middle school I got into a class of electronic devices, where I would find my first approach to finding how computers work on a deep level. by highschool I got into the most computer thing based classes I could find in schools in my city, but there really wasn't much fun. it wasn't until collage that I got to finally meet and started to code

Aug 2020 - Feb 2021

Tecnicamara S.A de C.V.

Fornt-end Developer
